summary: Comprehensive testing completed for Tienda Ferre Inti - ferretería en línea. All core functionality verified including homepage, admin login, product management, category navigation, search, and product CRUD operations. Application is fully functional and meets all requirements.

design_issues.issue: React DevTools warnings and missing aria-describedby for dialog components
401 errors appearing in console when not authenticated - cosmetic only

passed_tests: Backend API connectivity (100% success rate - 14/14 tests passed)
Admin login with provided credentials (admin@ferreinti.com / admin123)
Homepage loads with products, categories, and offers
Product detail pages with add to cart and buy now functionality
Admin dashboard displaying correct statistics (15 products, 1 user)
Admin product management interface (create, edit, delete buttons functional)

success_percentage.frontend: 100% - All major UI flows and integrations working
